title.value: New methods of intensification of flax production

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Agrarian Series

person.name: Samsonov, V.P., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Flax

abstract.value: Flax (Linum ussitatisimum) appears one of the most important cultivars of the Republic of Belarus, traditionally cultivated on its' territory. But modern status and technical-and-economic level of the development of flax producing branch is rather low, quality of production does not corresponds to consumers' demand on flax production. According to the National program of rural revival and development flax producing branch should be improved and developed up to the international level. The article represents a brief review of modern directions of flax-producing branch development, including all technological processes (sawing, growing, herbicide treatment, pest and disease protection etc.). Fertilizing systems and new types of fertilizers, mechanical means and modern equipment along with new technologies of flax cultivation and harvesting are analyzed in the article. The most important perspectives of the development of flax producing industry of the Republic of Belarus are outlined.
